arts.ttl: Serie A | Lecce 0-0 Verona: A point each is little help for either
arts.sum: Lecce are still without a home victory and Verona yet to celebrate any success in...

Lecce`s very first Serie A match, dated 8 September 1985, was against Verona, fresh from winning their first scudetto the previous season. Lecce still without home wins in this Serie A 2025/26: the giallorossi`s last victory dates back to 18 May, 1-0 over Torino.
